alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 11:21PM EST until February 18 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Estill and Powell Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...Until late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Moderate flooding begins. Several roads are impassable in and around Clay City. Some homes are flooded in low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 21.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 PM EST Friday was 21.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Saturday evening and continue falling to 5.3 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.1 feet on 02/25/2019. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 1 pm est Saturday.
